title: laefined98
author: laefined98
content: I'm looking to purchase a Dextools Trending Bot, must be fully functional on ETH and BSC chains.I will only pay via Escrow, i won't send you funds first.I must test the legitimacy of the bot and see it actually works on several tokens in order to make sure it's not a scam / simple scraper.I offer 3500$ but negotiable.If i dont answer here, my TG is: AlexDX1
